bug.author: sw005320
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/hirofumi0810>@hirofumi0810</denchmark-link> , is failed due to the missing test_set_iwslt2019.en directory, e.g., <denchmark-code>utils/split_scp.pl: Error opening input scp file data/test_set_iwslt2019.en/feats.scp: No such file or directory </denchmark-code>
Could you fix it?

comments.comment: I think so. I found data/test_set_iwslt2019 but not data/test_set_iwslt2019.en
Is it ok to use test_set_iwslt2019 instead of test_set_iwslt2019.en?
